title: Clean and Spacious 2-bed. In-unit laundry.
posting_body: Welcoming and well maintained 2-bed on full length of first floor of brick 3-flat on Marshall Blvd in West Pilsen/ Little Village.
In-unit laundry, large rear patio.
Beautiful carved oak trim with maple floors, stainless appliances and range top microwave.
Gas heat (tenant paid) and ceiling fans.
Bedrooms fit queen beds and have closets.
Separate large living and dining rooms.
Secure iron gated property.
Raised beds for growing vegetables in garden.
Respectful and long-time fellow tenants, experienced and responsive owner/manager.
Showing requests will be followed up and scheduled by voice call.
Showing begin August 15.
3 blocks to CTA Pink Line.
Walking distance to Pete's Fresh Market, Lagunitas Brewery and Cinespace.
Between to Rts 55 and 290.
Non-Smoking, Non-Airbnb property.
Application fee per adult.
No move-in fee.
Small, veterinarian verified pets negotiable.
No garage parking currently available.
Month to month storage in basement.
Video walkthrough of similar unit in building
